A ticket for Eggs-pedition Access: February. This ticket grants the following bonuses from February 1 at 10:00 a.m. to February 28, 2025, at 8:00 p.m. local time. • A single-use Incubator awarded for your first spin each day—up to 28 total if you purchase this ticket on or before February 1! • 3× XP awarded for your first spin each day. • 3× XP awarded for your first catch each day. • Hold 2× as many Gifts in your Item Bag (40 total). • Receive up to 150 Gifts per day from spinning PokéStops or Gyms. • Open up to 50 Gifts per day. In addition, you will receive Timed Research that awards 15,000 XP and 15,000 Stardust. Details can be found in the in-game News. You must play during the specified time to receive all the special event bonuses.

A ticket for Eggs-pedition Access: January. This ticket grants the following bonuses from January 1 at 10:00 a.m. to January 31, 2025, at 8:00 p.m. local time. • A single-use Incubator awarded for your first spin each day—up to 31 total if you purchase this ticket on or before January 1! • 3× XP awarded for your first spin each day. • 3× XP awarded for your first catch each day. • Hold 2× as many Gifts in your Item Bag (40 total). • Receive up to 150 Gifts per day from spinning PokéStops or Gyms. • Open up to 50 Gifts per day. In addition, you will receive Timed Research that awards 15,000 XP and 15,000 Stardust. Details can be found in the in-game News. You must play during the specified time to receive all the special event bonuses. If you purchase this ticket, you will not be able to purchase the version that includes the Egg Incubator Backpack avatar item at no cost. Learn more about this version and the ticket bonuses here.

Hey %PLAYERNAME%! I was just reflecting on our incredible journey together.
We've faced some extraordinary challenges side by side, from encountering gigantic Pokémon to thwarting Team GO Rocket's sinister plans time and time again.
Our research together has introduced us to Pokémon from many regions, leading to amazing discoveries and friendships that have helped shape how we see the world.
Speaking of discoveries, I have noticed some unusual sounds lately.
While I investigate I need you to continue your excellent fieldwork. Every Pokémon you encounter helps us understand our world a little better!
Incredible news, %PLAYERNAME%!  I've made a breakthrough with those mysterious vocalizations I was studying.
Just as I suspected, these aren’t ordinary sound waves but the unique melodies of the Mythical Pokémon Meloetta!
Meloetta uses song to influence the emotions of both people and Pokémon. I need you to keep exploring and see if you can spot any unusual behavior in local Pokémon.
It's not every day you get to study a Mythical Pokémon, %PLAYERNAME%, so let's make the most of it!
Ah, %PLAYERNAME%! We haven't found Meloetta yet but I can still hear that special vocalization.
Our musical friend can't be too far so we may need to think creatively.
Why don't you try singing and dancing to see if that has an affect on the people and Pokemon around you?
If you practice enough you may become Meloetta's next opening act!
Did you know many famous songs have been inspired by the melodies that Meloetta plays?
Music can truly help to create special bonds with one another.
It reminds me of you and your amazing ability to connect with both people and Pokémon. Every new Pokémon you catch or trainer you meet is another potential friend!
Get out there and see what wonderful friendships await you, %PLAYERNAME%!
%PLAYERNAME%, I just made a fascinating observation about our musical friend Meloetta. Did you know that this Mythical Pokémon was first discovered in the Unova region?
Whether it's coincidence or not, we must explore all avenues of research! Every task will help us understand Meloetta's patterns better.
Watch for Pokémon experiencing strong emotions, explore new areas, and make some musical connections of your own.
%PLAYERNAME%, this is the moment we've been waiting for!
Thanks to your dedicated fieldwork we've finally pinpointed its location. Its melodious voice is resonating from nearby.
This could be your moment to befriend this extraordinary Pokémon. It's sure to be a grand performance!
Head out there now, %PLAYERNAME%, and show Meloetta the same kindness and dedication you've shown to all your Pokémon friends.
%PLAYERNAME%, you've done it! And what a remarkable sight!
This Meloetta has such a striking appearance. Its distinctive coloring is unlike anything in my research notes…truly extraordinary!
Seeing your journey from your first days as a trainer to now catching such a special Pokemon, well, it makes me incredibly proud to call you my research partner and friend!
Keep that Meloetta singing proudly %PLAYERNAME%! You've hit all the right notes!

The duality that we have witnessed has revealed the sharp contrasts in this world’s nature—and its people.
I am particularly intrigued by the latest instance we encountered.
Both Blanche and Cliff sought innovation in battling, yet one took a defensive stance, and the other turned to the pursuit of power alone.
I would like to examine this further. If you will excuse me, I must review these findings with Professor Willow.
You are more experienced than I with battles, %PLAYERNAME%, so please provide your insight. Would you agree that a balanced approach is important for a Pokémon Trainer?
Intriguing. Perhaps that is the key, then, to understanding these recent events.
All things have two sides. Focusing on only one of those sides is unlikely to yield good results.
Let us look to the future. Experience suggests we may soon receive word from the professor regarding Candela or the last Team GO Rocket leader.
Let us ready ourselves. In the meantime, I will—I think I have this expression right—“catch ya later.”
The latest intel suggests that Cliff has been training like there’s no tomorrow, and supposedly he’s got a new strategy: all-out attack.
Meanwhile, Blanche has had a research breakthrough and wants to cultivate the abilities of Pokémon with potent defense.
Attack and defense, opposite but complementary—just like last time. I bet we can learn more about this duality if we dig in a bit.
On that note, let’s hear it—which of their strategies do you want to investigate further?
Greetings, %PLAYERNAME%. Your assistance will be most welcome.
My research has led me to one conclusion: obvious though it may seem, the surest way to win a battle is to never lose it.
In other words, if your Pokémon never faints, victory is the only possible outcome.
Lapras and I have begun testing several methodologies that maximize its defense potential. Would you and your Pokémon partners like to join us?
Hey, watch where you’re standing! I’m training here!
The full-power attacks I’m working on will make Team GO Rocket unstoppable. What's with that look? Don’t believe it?
It’s easy. You get your Pokémon to hit so hard that their opponents never even get a CHANCE to hit back!
Hmph, not that it matters for you. I doubt a weakling like you could ever get your Pokémon to pull an attack like that off.
And that means if you’re hanging around here, you’re holding me back. So beat it!
Congratulations on a job well done.
My analysis of recent battles has disproven my previous theory—though the fault does not lie with you.
I had Lapras so focused on defense that I neglected to give it opportunities to attack.
I fear I’ve stymied its growth. The logical next step is to provide Berries, praise, and—critically—a more well-rounded training regimen.
Further work can wait until after we rest, though. %PLAYERNAME%, if you’ve taught me anything today, it’s the importance of a balanced approach.
Hrm. Strength reigns supreme, but something’s still missing!
The problem with only focusing on attacks is that it makes you let your guard down.
Maybe the boss would prefer it if I used offense AND defense...
This won’t stop me, though! I’ll master the power of balance for Team GO Rocket, no matter what it takes!
